structure.unit: Chapter 17B METROPOLITAN MIAMI-DADE COUNTY DEMOLITION OF UNINHABITABLE STRUCTURES ORDINANCE

text.section:
Sec. 17B-6. Violation.
It shall be a violation of this chapter for any person to erect, establish, maintain, owe, lease or allow to exist an uninhabitable structure as defined in. Any such violation shall be redressed by Metropolitan Miami-Dade County in the manner set forth in this chapter.
